name: Elron
description: ELRON is to serve as the utility token while being able to capture revenue generated from the fund and distribute it among ELRON holders in the form of dividends. ELRON dividend distribution model works on the basis of 50:50 split with the VIP fund providers and the secondary market ELRON token holders. ELRON token holders in the secondary market (tokens purchased from PancakeSwap) will have a share in 50% of the dividend distribution. 50% dividend distribution will be followed by 40% dividend, 45% to buy back & reward LP holder, and 15% for operation.
